data.title: Sarah Clarke Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Sarah Clarke with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Attended high school and remains good friends with actor Jon Hamm (Mad Men)

Is fluent in Italian

Had no interest in acting until she was studying in Italy during her senior year of college

Worked as an architectural photographer after college graduation

Attended the Circle in the Square Theatre School in New York

Previously acted under the name Sarah Lively (her first and middle names)

Met husband Xander Berkeley on the set of 24 in February 2001; they kept their off-screen romance a secret
